src:
Deddy Mizwar Gabung Partai Gelora, Demokrat: Terima Kasih Pengabdiannya
07 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Ketua Majelis Pertimbangan Daerah (MPD) Demokrat Jabar Deddy Mizwar mengisyaratkan bergabung dengan Partai Gelora. Kadiv Advokasi dan Hukum Partai Demokrat, Ferdinand Hutahaean, mengatakan partainya berterima kasih atas pengabdian Deddy Mizwar selama ini.
"Jadi kami sama sekali tidak merasa terganggu dan mengucapkan terima kasih selama pengabdian oleh Deddy Mizwar di Partai Demokrat. Kami tentu menghormati dan menghargai jasa pengabdian beliau di Partai Demokrat," kata Ferdinand kepada detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam.
Ferdinand menghormati keputusan Deddy Mizwar yang berpindah partai. Menurutnya, hal itu adalah hak politik Deddy Mizwar.
"Kami Partai Demokrat, tidak mempermasalahkan partai politik dari Dedy Mizwar yang berasal dari Partai Demokrat dan yang kan bergabung dengan Gelora. Tentu itu adalah hak politik beliau yang sah ya," jelasnya.
text:
Deddy Mizwar Joins the Gelora Party, Democrat: Thank You for Your Service
Nov 7 2019, 08:13 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Chairman of the Regional Advisory Council (MPD) of West Java Democratic Deddy Mizwar signaled joining the Gelora Party. Kadiv Advocacy and Law of the Democratic Party, Ferdinand Hutahaean, said his party was grateful for Deddy Mizwar's services so far.
"So we are not at all disturbed and thanked during the dedication by Deddy Mizwar in the Democratic Party. We certainly respect and appreciate his service in the Democratic Party," Ferdinand told AFP on Wednesday (6/11/2019) night.
Ferdinand respected Deddy Mizwar's decision to change parties. According to him, that was Deddy Mizwar's political right.
"We, the Democrat Party, have no problem with the political party from Dedy Mizwar who is from the Democratic Party and who will join Gelora. Of course it is his legal political right," he explained.
